pages.text:
Course Conditions
Fundraising Events
Host Your Own Event
Fairwinds Golf Course specializes in all the details that will make your event successful.  Weather you are looking to raise funds for a charity, host a business outing or offer a unique incentive to your employees, Fairwinds’ staff of PGA Professionals will make any event memorable.  We specialize in groups of 40 to 80 players. Just completed is our fabulous event gazebo complete with audio/visual equipment and spectacular views of the surrounding golf course.
Our Services & Packages Include:
Shotgun Starts
Bag Drop Service
Greens Fees and Cart Fees
Range Balls
Closest to Hole and Long Drive Contest Proximity Markers
All tournament set up including golf cart signage, registration lists and tournament scoring by a Fairwinds’ Staff Member.
A variety of food & beverage options from our partner The Rusty Putter.
Round of Golf for four to be used as a prize.
Please contact Mark Cammarene, PGA General Manager for pricing information.

Course Conditions
Club Events
29th Annual Chuck Hill Classic – Saturday, August 23, 2025
Proceeds from the 29th annual Chuck Hill Golf Classic will help fund the Boys & Girls Clubs’ Workforce Readiness Program, providing vital career resources to young people in our community. The program offers personalized career coaching, job search assistance, and professional development workshops to help them reach their full potential. By donating to this cause, you are investing in the future of our community by empowering young people with the skills and tools they need to succeed in the workforce and contribute to the growth of our economy.
Full Results
